CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Multiple managed accounts
CurrentVersion.description: Allows people to use a single device with multiple company accounts to access company information through specific managed applications.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Multiple managed accounts
OldVersion.description: Allows people to use a single device with multiple company accounts to access company information through specific managed applications.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Save meeting content with collaborative annotations as a Whiteboard
CurrentVersion.description: Collaborative annotations, available now, enable meeting participants with the Presenter role to enable annotations after sharing their screen. This allows everyone in the meeting to draw, add a note, react, highlight text, and more to share their thoughts right on the content, live with everyone else. Now, participants sharing their screen will have the ability to save content with collaborative annotations as a Whiteboard, enabling all meeting participants to revisit this content and continue collaborating after the meeting.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Save meeting content with collaborative annotations as a Whiteboard
OldVersion.description: Collaborative annotations, available now, enable meeting participants with the Presenter role to enable annotations after sharing their screen. This allows everyone in the meeting to draw, add a note, react, highlight text, and more to share their thoughts right on the content, live with everyone else. Now, participants sharing their screen will have the ability to save content with collaborative annotations as a Whiteboard, enabling all meeting participants to revisit this content and continue collaborating after the meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability for meeting participants to edit their display name
CurrentVersion.description: Teams meeting participants will be able to edit their display name, enabling more flexibility in their meeting presence, regardless of their tenant set display name. Users can make this change during the meeting and it will persist throughout the duration of the meeting.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability for meeting participants to edit their display name
OldVersion.description: Teams meeting participants will be able to edit their display name, enabling more flexibility in their meeting presence, regardless of their tenant set display name. Users can make this change during the meeting and it will persist throughout the duration of the meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Click Through Collaborative Annotations Layer
CurrentVersion.description: Users are now able to click through the annotation layer to interact with content in meetings without restarting the current annotation session.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Click Through Collaborative Annotations Layer
OldVersion.description: Users are now able to click through the annotation layer to interact with content in meetings without restarting the current annotation session.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights Attribute clones
CurrentVersion.description: New logic allows analysts to build on or combine existing organizational attributes. For instance, a new org attribute that combines several roles that can then be used to filter results in the analysis.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights Attribute clones
OldVersion.description: New logic allows analysts to build on or combine existing organizational attributes. For instance, a new org attribute that combines several roles that can then be used to filter results in the analysis.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Progressive alert scoring
CurrentVersion.description:
,
With this new feature, user activities that could potentially result in data security incidents will be assessed more frequently within a 24-hour period compared with the current practice of once every 24 hours. Alert insights will now be updated every few hours with this increased frequency, providing designated analysts with timely alerts and continuously evolving insights. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Progressive alert scoring
OldVersion.description:
,
With this new feature, user activities that could potentially result in data security incidents will be assessed more frequently within a 24-hour period compared with the current practice of once every 24 hours. Alert insights will now be updated every few hours with this increased frequency, providing designated analysts with timely alerts and continuously evolving insights. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent Meeting Recap for scheduled channel meetings (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Intelligent recap is now available for scheduled channel meetings, so users can easily browse the meeting recording by speakers and topics, as well as access AI-generated meeting notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions. Intelligent recap features are also available as a part of the Copilot for Microsoft 365 license.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent Meeting Recap for scheduled channel meetings (Premium)
OldVersion.description: Intelligent recap is now available for scheduled channel meetings, so users can easily browse the meeting recording by speakers and topics, as well as access AI-generated meeting notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions. Intelligent recap features are also available as a part of the Copilot for Microsoft 365 license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Skin tone setting and reactions
CurrentVersion.description: In Teams settings, users have the option to select their preferred skin tone. This preference will be applied to all emojis and reactions in chats, channels, and meetings, allowing users to express themselves more authentically in conversations.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Skin tone reactions
OldVersion.description: In Teams settings, users have the option to select their preferred skin tone. This preference will be applied to all emojis and reactions in chats, channels, and desktop/web meetings, allowing users to express themselves more authentically in conversations.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Citations for Copilot in Teams meetings available on mobile
CurrentVersion.description: Now available on mobile, Copilot in Teams responses have a citation number at the end of each Copilot statement that provides detail on the meeting artifact or source that Copilot used to generate the response, like the meeting transcript. Users can select the citation to see which speaker the citation is attributed to, the exact quote from the transcript, as well as the time stamp of the quote in the transcript. Selecting a reference number will open a transcript viewer that displays the source of the response.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Citations for Copilot in Teams meetings available on mobile
OldVersion.description: Now available on mobile, Copilot in Teams responses have a citation number at the end of each Copilot statement that provides detail on the meeting artifact or source that Copilot used to generate the response, like the meeting transcript. Users can select the citation to see which speaker the citation is attributed to, the exact quote from the transcript, as well as the time stamp of the quote in the transcript. Selecting a reference number will open a transcript viewer that displays the source of the response.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention- Adding matched attachment details in Activity Explorer for Data Loss Prevention rules in Exchange
CurrentVersion.description: ,With this feature, the admins can see more information like name, size, labels about the attachments present in the email that violated the Data Loss Prevention rules. Note: The month and status have been updated to reflect the current state.  We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention- Adding matched attachment details in Activity Explorer for Data Loss Prevention rules in Exchange
OldVersion.description: ,With this feature, the admins can see more information like name, size, labels about the attachments present in the email that violated the Data Loss Prevention rules.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Outlook Mobile - Junk/Phishing Reporting Actions Integrated with Microsoft Defender
CurrentVersion.description: The appearance and behavior of Report Phishing/Report Junk actions in Outlook for iOS and Outlook for Android can be controlled by admins using User Reported Settings in security.microsoft.com. Admins will be able to control whether these Report actions appear in Outlook, where these messages get reported to, and whether the user is prompted when they report phishing or junk. Admins will also be able to customize text and other aspects of the dialogs that appear before and after users' report phishing or junk.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Outlook Mobile - Junk/Phishing Reporting Actions Integrated with Microsoft Defender
OldVersion.description: The appearance and behavior of Report Phishing/Report Junk actions in Outlook for iOS and Outlook for Android can be controlled by admins using User Reported Settings in security.microsoft.com. Admins will be able to control whether these Report actions appear in Outlook, where these messages get reported to, and whether the user is prompted when they report phishing or junk. Admins will also be able to customize text and other aspects of the dialogs that appear before and after users' report phishing or junk.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Junk/Phishing reporting actions integrated with Microsoft Defender in classic Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: The appearance and behavior of Report Phishing/Report Junk actions in classic Outlook for Windows can be controlled by admins using User Reported Settings in security.microsoft.com. Admins will be able to control whether these Report actions appear in Outlook, where these messages get reported to, and whether the user is prompted when they report phishing or junk. Admins will also be able to customize text and other aspects of the dialogs that appear before and after users' report phishing or junk.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Junk/Phishing reporting actions integrated with Microsoft Defender in classic Outlook for Windows
OldVersion.description: The appearance and behavior of Report Phishing/Report Junk actions in classic Outlook for Windows can be controlled by admins using User Reported Settings in security.microsoft.com. Admins will be able to control whether these Report actions appear in Outlook, where these messages get reported to, and whether the user is prompted when they report phishing or junk. Admins will also be able to customize text and other aspects of the dialogs that appear before and after users' report phishing or junk.

CurrentVersion.description: The appearance and behavior of Report Phishing/Report Junk actions in Outlook for Mac can be controlled by admins using User Reported Settings in security.microsoft.com. Admins will be able to control whether these Report actions appear in Outlook, where these messages get reported to, and whether the user is prompted when they report phishing or junk. Admins will also be able to customize text and other aspects of the dialogs that appear before and after users' report phishing or junk.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Outlook for Mac - Junk/Phishing Reporting Actions Integrated with Microsoft Defender
OldVersion.description: The appearance and behavior of Report Phishing/Report Junk actions in Outlook for Mac can be controlled by admins using User Reported Settings in security.microsoft.com. Admins will be able to control whether these Report actions appear in Outlook, where these messages get reported to, and whether the user is prompted when they report phishing or junk. Admins will also be able to customize text and other aspects of the dialogs that appear before and after users' report phishing or junk.

CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: Sticky Note Visual Refresh
CurrentVersion.description: This updates the visuals of the sticky note feature in Whiteboard.

OldVersion.title: Whiteboard: Sticky Note Visual Refresh
OldVersion.description: This updates the visuals of the sticky note feature in Whiteboard.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Organize and reorder folders in the new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: ,Users can arrange folders in any desired order effortlessly by dragging and dropping the folders in the position that they want. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Organize and reorder folders in the new Outlook for Windows and web
OldVersion.description: Users can arrange folders in any desired order effortlessly by dragging and dropping the folders in the position that they want. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Extending support for viewing MIP Protected PDF Files to different sovereignties (including GCCH)
CurrentVersion.description: ,Sovereign cloud customers (including GCCH) will be able to open MIP protected PDF content in Microsoft Edge. This change will be available in the Microsoft Edge built-in PDF reader powered by Adobe Acrobat and the legacy Microsoft Edge PDF engine.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Extending support for viewing MIP Protected PDF Files to different sovereignties (including GCCH)
OldVersion.description: ,Sovereign cloud customers (including GCCH) will be able to open MIP protected PDF content in Microsoft Edge. This change will be available in the Microsoft Edge built-in PDF reader powered by Adobe Acrobat and the legacy Microsoft Edge PDF engine.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Regional announcements for FLW users in Viva Connections
CurrentVersion.description: Create and share time sensitive messages in Viva Connections and target your FLW users based on attributes including job, description and title. You can view these announcements on Viva Connections desktop, mobile and tablet.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Regional announcements for FLW users in Viva Connections
OldVersion.description: Create and share time sensitive messages in Viva Connections and target your FLW users based on attributes including job, description and title. You can view these announcements on Viva Connections desktop, mobile and tablet.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints - New device properties in device onboarding page
CurrentVersion.description: ,Added new device details to provide more insights on the device health. This includes OS build, Defender engine version, Defender Mocamp version, sensitive data activity, Advanced Classification bandwidth usage exceeded, valid user, server DLP status, and first onboarded date.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints - New device properties in device onboarding page
OldVersion.description: ,Added new device details to provide more insights on the device health. This includes OS build, Defender engine version, Defender Mocamp version, sensitive data activity, Advanced Classification bandwidth usage exceeded, valid user, server DLP status, and first onboarded date.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview Information Protection: Shared mailbox support security group assignments on encrypted mail access in Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: ,Members in mail-enabled security group that are assigned to a shared mailbox can access encrypted mail directly using Outlook for Windows. Users can access encrypted mail with Do Not Forward or Encrypt-only protection.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview Information Protection: Shared mailbox support security group assignments on encrypted mail access in Outlook for Windows
OldVersion.description: Members in mail-enabled security group that are assigned to a shared mailbox can access encrypted mail directly using Outlook for Windows. Users can access encrypted mail with Do Not Forward or Encrypt-only protection.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): New proactive assistance in Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: Catch-up is a new experience in Copilot which aims to proactively help users catch up and take action on important updates. It contains a group of cards. Each card has an update related to an important meeting or document. It will work in M365chat and Teams Copilot. It shows up as a tab on the home page.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance Security Copilot - Contextual Summarization
CurrentVersion.description: ,Communication Compliance introduces the Security Copilot feature to generate contextual summaries of long messages in the context of the conditions that flagged the messages as potentially risky. Investigators can pinpoint the potentially risky content in the message and understand the premise of the entire message with just one click of a button. In addition to contextual summaries, users can ask additional questions in an open text prompt for deeper insight on the message content.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance Security Copilot - Contextual Summarization
OldVersion.description: ,Communication Compliance introduces the Security Copilot feature to generate contextual summaries of long messages in the context of the conditions that flagged the messages as potentially risky. Investigators can pinpoint the potentially risky content in the message and understand the premise of the entire message with just one click of a button. In addition to contextual summaries, users can ask additional questions in an open text prompt for deeper insight on the message content.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Add Shared Folders to Favorites in the new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: ,Customers will have the ability to add shared folders to their favorites. This enhancement offers users increased flexibility and convenience, allowing easy and quick access to important shared content directly from their Favorites list. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Add Shared Folders to Favorites in the new Outlook for Windows and web
OldVersion.description: ,Customers will have the ability to add shared folders to their favorites. This enhancement offers users increased flexibility and convenience, allowing easy and quick access to important shared content directly from their Favorites list. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Whiteboard Copilot – First run experience
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot FRE will guide first-time users to discover and leverage the power of Whiteboard Copilot features. ?

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Whiteboard Copilot – First run experience
OldVersion.description: Copilot FRE will guide first-time users to discover and leverage the power of Whiteboard Copilot features. ?

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Automatic data preservation for high-risk users
CurrentVersion.description: ,Adaptive Protection in Microsoft Purview helps you protect your organization’s data by integrating dynamic insider risk levels, determined by data related activities, with various policy engines to automatically moving users in and out of policies as their risk levels change over time. The integration with Data Lifecycle Management will automatically apply retention labels to preserve deleted emails and files based on a user’s insider risk level.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Automatic data preservation for high-risk users
OldVersion.description: ,Adaptive Protection in Microsoft Purview helps you protect your organization’s data by integrating dynamic insider risk levels, determined by data related activities, with various policy engines to automatically moving users in and out of policies as their risk levels change over time. The integration with Data Lifecycle Management will automatically apply retention labels to preserve deleted emails and files based on a user’s insider risk level.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Auto-discarding Sleeping Tabs
CurrentVersion.description: Tabs that have been sleeping for a long time will be discarded to save memory. When a user navigates back to a discarded tab, the tab will need to be reloaded. This can be managed through the AutoDiscardSleepingTabsEnabled policy. This policy will be enabled if the SleepingTabsEnabled policy is enabled.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Auto-discarding Sleeping Tabs
OldVersion.description: Tabs that have been sleeping for a long time will be discarded to save memory. When a user navigates back to a discarded tab, the tab will need to be reloaded. This can be managed through the AutoDiscardSleepingTabsEnabled policy. This policy will be enabled if the SleepingTabsEnabled policy is enabled.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse – Integration into Viva Connections Dashboard
CurrentVersion.description: ,Viva Connections will support Viva Pulse cards where admins can add Pulse cards to the Connections Dashboard. Users can create a Pulse survey from the Connections Dashboard. Users of the Connections Dashboard will be notified about Pulse surveys they send as well.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse – Integration into Viva Connections Dashboard
OldVersion.description: ,Viva Connections will support Viva Pulse cards where admins can add Pulse cards to the Connections Dashboard. Users can create a Pulse survey from the Connections Dashboard. Users of the Connections Dashboard will be notified about Pulse surveys they send as well.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Shared tab in chat
CurrentVersion.description: The Files tab in chat is now ‘Shared’. The shared tab shows all the files and links that were sent in the chat, making it easier to find them- all in one place. Channels are not affected by this change.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Lab available in Copilot for Microsoft 365 on mobile
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot Lab will allow users to browse and use suggested prompts in Copilot for Microsoft 365 on mobile platforms.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Graph: Copilot for Microsoft 365 usage
CurrentVersion.description: The Graph API provides access to Copilot for Microsoft 365 usage insights and analytics, allowing for the creation of customized reporting and analytics.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage change log for leaders and audiences identified
CurrentVersion.description: Admins and corporate communicators will be able to see any leaders who were added or removed in Viva Engage, as well as any audiences and removed from a leader in Viva Engage.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal:  Insider Risk Management - Microsoft Defender for Endpoint alerts
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Enables you to import indicators from Microsoft Defender for Endpoint related to unapproved or malicious software installation or bypassing security controls. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, security and policy violations, and more. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy. Note: We are updating this item to reflect changes to this deployment. We appreciate your patience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal:  Insider Risk Management - Microsoft Defender for Endpoint alerts
OldVersion.description: ,Enables you to import indicators from Microsoft Defender for Endpoint related to unapproved or malicious software installation or bypassing security controls. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, security and policy violations, and more. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy. Note: We are updating this item to reflect changes to this deployment. We appreciate your patience.
